description:
When Miro’s life is at stake under Surt’s malicious scheme, there emerges the strongest Gold Saint of Athena – Gemini Saga! Meanwhile, Helena, whom Deathmask secretly fancies, falls for the ferocious God Warrior Fafner’s offer for “medical treatment”.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adunata! I sette cavalieri di Asgard!
集結! 七人の神闘士
